name: Ronald STOCKTON, Appellant v. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, BUSINESS MANAGER-DECKER, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Stockton v. Department of Corrections, Business Manager-Decker

parties: Ronald STOCKTON, Appellant v. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, BUSINESS MANAGER-DECKER, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 18th day of November, 2015, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Theron Richard Perez, Jeffrey M. Paladina, PA Dept, of Corrections, Mechanicsburg, for Appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
126 A.3d 959
Ronald STOCKTON, Appellant v. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, BUSINESS MANAGER-DECKER, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Nov. 18, 2015.
Ronald Stockton, pro se.
Theron Richard Perez, Jeffrey M. Paladina, PA Dept, of Corrections, Mechanicsburg, for Appellee.
